summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Judicial Nominating Committee of the Dallas City Council will convene on June 25, 2024, at 1:30 PM in the Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall. The meeting will be accessible both in-person and via videoconference, aimed at discussing the selection of judges for the city.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the previous meeting held on June 4, 2024.
2. An executive session to deliberate the potential appointment and employment of full-time Municipal Judges and Associate Judges.
3. Consideration of recommendations from the Judicial Nominating Commission regarding the selection of judges.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will review recommendations for the positions of full-time Municipal Judge and Associate Judge, which are critical for maintaining judicial functions within the city. The meeting will also include a closed executive session to discuss sensitive matters related to the appointment of judges, ensuring confidentiality and compliance with legal standards.

**Action Items**:  
The committee seeks approval of the minutes from the previous meeting and will deliberate on the Judicial Nominating Commission's recommendations for the selection of judges. Final decisions on these appointments will be made during this session, requiring a consensus from committee members.
